ygData.subject: Authentication Problem [Please Help] [Urgent]

Hi,
I am having trouble crawling authenticated (password protected) 
pages.=
 I am using RFC Realm based authentication.
Here is the log information I g=
ot:

05/02/2008 21:07:46 +0000 FINE 
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMeth=
odDirector
isAuthenticationNeeded Authorization required

05/02/2008 21:07:=
46 +0000 INFO 
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector
isAuthentic=
ationNeeded Authentication requested but doAuthentication 
is disable

Can =
anyone please help me? What does it mean by "doAuthentication is 
disable"?=
 Is it disabled in the server? or, I have to enable 
something in Heritrix?=


Thanks in advance.

Sajib
